description: Get real-time quotes for Uniswap token swaps. Execute trades with optimal routing to improve price and reduce slippage. Receive swap suggestions for your chosen tokens.

infuraKey.description: Infura API key for RPC endpoints

walletPrivateKey.description: Private key of the wallet for executing swaps

tools.name: getPrice
tools.description: Get a price quote for a Uniswap swap, supporting multi-hop routes

chainId.description: Chain ID (1: Ethereum, 10: Optimism, 137: Polygon, 42161: Arbitrum, 42220: Celo, 56: BNB Chain, 43114: Avalanche, 8453: Base)

tokenIn.description: Input token address ('NATIVE' for native token like ETH)

amountIn.description: Exact input amount (required for exactIn trades)

tokenOut.description: Output token address ('NATIVE' for native token like ETH)

amountOut.description: Exact output amount (required for exactOut trades)

tradeType.description: Trade type: exactIn requires amountIn, exactOut requires amountOut
